name: Mars Colony One
description:
A minimalistic city-building game set on Mars. Mine resources, and build power plants, farms, and habitats. When your colony has prospered, build a rocket ship back to Earth.

Features

  • Build a colony with 6 unique buildings
  • Balance 5 different resources: metals, water, energy, food and colonists
  • Minimalist design
  • Use the launch pad building to send rockets back to earth
  • Simple objectives for completing the game
  • Original soundtracks

Development

This game was create for the Magalu Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours. The game was built with Unity, on top of an already release project (Grid Miner) and uses a bunch of assets. 

The future of the game is still uncertain. For now the game is a prototype with about 30 minutes of gameplay. Maybe with a little more work this game can get to a release state. 

Please leave a comment if you liked or played the game. Your feedback  really helps make the game better.
